thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 08 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-CAPREIT Reports Q1 NFFO Per Basic Unit Of $0.463

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CAPREIT Reports Q1 NFFO Per Basic Unit Of $0.463

organizations.name: apartment properties real estate investment trust

text:
May 8 (Reuters) - Canadian Apartment Properties Real Estate Investment Trust:
* CAPREIT REPORTS CONTINUED GROWTH AND STRONG OPERATING PERFORMANCE IN FIRST QUARTER OF 2018
* Q1 REVENUE ROSE 8 PERCENT * QTRLY OPERATING REVENUES $168.019 MILLION VERSUS $155.610 MILLION
* QTRLY NFFO PER UNIT BASIC $0.463 * IN 2018, EXPECTS TO COMPLETE PROPERTY CAPITAL INVESTMENTS (EXCLUDING DEVELOPMENT AND INTENSIFICATION) OF ABOUT $185 MILLION TO $195 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
